channel.title: Stop being lazy and help mwe instead!
channel.description:
npc.cfg: file not found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException NPCEmotes.cfg was not found. at server.npcs.NpcAnimHandler.loadanim(Unknown Source) at server.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(Unknown Source) at server.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.server.main(Unknown Source)
Npc.cfg and NpcEmotes.cfg are both in the config folder
packging
src server.java client.java constants.java other folders
build classes server config npc emote npc
yea..
